mean_en: "to produce a change in somebody/something; (of a disease) to attack somebody or a part of the body; to make somebody become ill/sick; to make somebody have strong feelings of sadness
sentence: My mood tends to be affected by bad weather.
sentence_trans: 糟糕的天气往往会影响我的心情。
word_etyma: af加强 + fect做，制作 → 做得让人加强印象 → affect影响；感动
